altername_name: Hudson Soft New Soft Line Up for Sega Saturn
ハドソン 新作 プレビュー
name: Hudson Soft: New Soft Line Up for Sega Saturn
overview: Hudson Soft New Soft Line Up for Sega Saturn, also called Hudson Shinsaku Preview (ハドソン 新作 プレビュー), is a demo disc published by Hudson Soft for the Sega Saturn containing demos of five Hudson games.
